topic.title: Built-in Publishing Templates Gallery
topic.shortdesc: comes bundled with a list of built-in templates. You can use one of them to publish your documentation or as a starting point for a new publishing template.

body.draft-comment:
Some hints:
Application comes with a list of built-in templates.
built-in template can be divided in two categories: tiles and tree.
a built-in template can be used as starting point for a new template

section.title: Tiles and Tree built-in Templates
section.p: Depending on the layout of the main page, the available templates can be grouped in two categories:

dd.p: The main page layout presents a tile for each main topic of the documentation.
The main page layout presents a tile for each main topic of the documentation.

section.p: You can preview the built-in templates on Web site.

section.title: Built-in Templates Location
section.p: All built-in templates are stored in the /templates directory.
